high_descs: Walk forward to the toilet, then turn right and walk to the candle on the counter between the two sinks.
Pick up the candle from the counter.
Turn around and walk slightly forward to the toilet.
Put the candle on the top of the toilet, to the left of the toilet paper.
anns.task_desc: Move a candle from a counter to the top of a toilet.

high_descs: Head right at the toilet and walk to the middle of the vanity with two sinks.
Pick up the candle holder with the candle in between the sinks on the counter.
Head left and turn left at the wall to face the toilet.
Put the candle holder with the candle on the right side of the toilet tank in front of the full roll of toilet paper.
anns.task_desc: Place a candle holder with a candle on a toilet tank.

high_descs: Go right and stand in front of the counter in between the sinks.
Pick the candle up from the counter.
Turn around and face the toilet.
Put the candle on the back of the toilet.
anns.task_desc: Put a candle on the back of a toilet.
